statements: SELECT * FROM charging_history WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT charging_id, charging_date, charging_cost FROM charging_history WHERE charging_cost > 50.00;
SELECT charging_id, charging_duration FROM charging_history WHERE charging_duration > INTERVAL '2 hours';
SELECT vehicle_id, charging_start_time, charging_end_time FROM charging_history ORDER BY charging_start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM charging_history WHERE charging_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM charging_history WHERE vehicle_id = 123
SELECT charging_cost, charging_duration FROM charging_history WHERE charging_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND charging_cost > 50
SELECT charging_id, vehicle_id, charging_cost FROM charging_history WHERE charging_start_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '18:00:00' ORDER BY charging_cost DESC
SELECT charging_id, charging_date, charging_duration FROM charging_history WHERE charging_date = '2022-02-15' AND charging_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour' ORDER BY charging_duration
SELECT COUNT(charging_id) AS total_charges, SUM(charging_cost) AS total_cost FROM charging_history WHERE charging_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM charging_stations;
SELECT location, charging_ports FROM charging_stations;
SELECT id, location, power_rating FROM charging_stations WHERE charging_ports > 5;
SELECT * FROM charging_history WHERE kwh_delivered BETWEEN 10.0 AND 20.0;
SELECT vehicle_id, start_time, end_time FROM charging_history ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations;
SELECT location, charging_ports FROM charging_stations ORDER BY charging_ports DESC;
SELECT id, location, power_rating FROM charging_stations WHERE power_rating > 10.0;
SELECT event_id, charging_station_id, vehicle_id, start_time FROM charging_history ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT charging_station_id, SUM(kwh_delivered) AS total_kwh FROM charging_history GROUP BY charging_station_id HAVING SUM(kwh_delivered) > 100.0;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations;
SELECT station_name, location FROM charging_stations ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, model_name, battery_capacity FROM vehicle_profiles WHERE battery_capacity > 500;
SELECT record_id, charging_start, charging_end, vehicle_id, energy_delivered FROM charging_records ORDER BY charging_start DESC;
SELECT station_name, location, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM charging_stations cs JOIN charging_records cr ON cs.id = cr.station_id GROUP BY station_name, location;
SELECT station_name, location FROM charging_stations
SELECT * FROM vehicle_profiles ORDER BY model_name DESC
SELECT station_id, SUM(energy_delivered) AS total_energy FROM charging_records GROUP BY station_id
SELECT * FROM charging_records WHERE charging_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59'
SELECT model_name, battery_capacity FROM vehicle_profiles WHERE battery_capacity > 500 ORDER BY battery_capacity ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, charging_status FROM vehicles WHERE charging_status = 'Charging';
SELECT station_name, location, operator FROM charging_stations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time, kwh_delivered FROM charging_sessions WHERE kwh_delivered > 50 ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE charging_status = 'Charging';
SELECT vehicle_name, charging_status, charge_start_time FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;
SELECT station_name, operator, price_per_kwh FROM charging_stations WHERE price_per_kwh > 0 ORDER BY price_per_kwh DESC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, r.registration_date FROM users u JOIN registrations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT v.vehicle_name, c.start_time, c.end_time, c.kwh_delivered FROM vehicles v JOIN charging_sessions c ON v.id = c.vehicle_id WHERE c.kwh_delivered > 10 ORDER BY c.start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Charging_Stations
SELECT station_name, location FROM Charging_Stations
SELECT vehicle_id, model, manufacturer FROM Vehicles
SELECT * FROM Charging_Records ORDER BY end_time DESC
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM Charging_Stations ORDER BY station_id DESC;
SELECT station_name, location FROM Charging_Stations WHERE charging_capacity > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, c.start_time FROM Users u JOIN Charging_Records c ON u.user_id = c.vehicle_id WHERE u.age > 25 AND c.record_id < 100 ORDER BY c.start_time DESC;

SELECT v.model, v.manufacturer, cs.location, p.amount FROM Vehicles v JOIN Charging_Records cr ON v.vehicle_id = cr.vehicle_id JOIN Charging_Stations cs ON cr.station_id = cs.station_id JOIN Payments p ON cr.record_id = p.record_id WHERE v.vehicle_type = 'Electric' ORDER BY p.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Charging_Stations WHERE location LIKE '%City' OR location LIKE '%Town' LIMIT 5;
